title: Goodbye, 27-inch iMac; hello Mac Studio and Studio Display — Apple discontinues all-in-one
content:
Two things happened at the conclusion of today’s Apple event. John Ternus teased one more Mac with Apple silicon coming (the Mac Pro) while omitting the 27-inch iMac. Then Apple removed the 27-inch iMac from its online shop without notice.

more…

The post Goodbye, 27-inch iMac; hello Mac Studio and Studio Display — Apple discontinues all-in-one appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Two things happened at the conclusion of today’s Apple event. John Ternus teased one more Mac with Apple silicon coming (the Mac Pro) while omitting the 27-inch iMac. Then Apple removed the 27-inch iMac from its online shop without notice. Apple replaced the 21.5-inch iMac running on Intel last year with the 24-inch iMac with […]
